analysis.description:
BBCToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#365-377) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#371-375)
Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#56-57) should be declared external
BBCToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#236-237) should be declared external
Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#57-58) should be declared external
AbstractToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#88-93) should be declared external
BBCToken.createTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#296-322) should be declared external
BBCToken.setOwner (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#330-336) should be declared external
BBCToken.freezeTransfers (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#342-349) should be declared external
BBCToken.unfreezeTransfers (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#350-351) should be declared external
BBCToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#365-377) should be declared external
BBCToken.freezeAccount (/unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol#383-396) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x31b566a89cef7962aa647ae6766ea8fb1dd6ccdb.sol:
